9 void repulsion::init (double dist_critical, double dist_avoid, string repulsion_shape)
10 {
11  this->dist_critical = dist_critical;
12  this->dist_avoid = dist_avoid;
13  this->repulsion_shape = repulsion_shape;
14  reset();
15 }
16 
17 bool repulsion::calc ()
18 {
19  // no position given yet
20  if (pos_valid == false)
21  return false;
22 
23  // no setpoint defined
24  if (setpoint == CONTROL_UNDEFINED)
25  return false;
26 
27  // invalid distances
28  if (dist_avoid < dist_critical)
29  return false;
30 
31  // repulsion from other cpss, normalized to [0,neighbors]
32  geometry_msgs::Vector3 repulsion;
33  int neighbors;
34  double closest;
35  repulse(repulsion, neighbors, closest);
36 
37  // no avoidance necessary
38  if (neighbors <= 0) {
39  return false;
40  }
41 
42  // direction towards goal position, normalized to [0,1]
43  geometry_msgs::Vector3 target = target_direction();
44 
45  // avoidance direction (class variable) as sum of all repulsions and target direction
46  direction.x = target.x + repulsion.x;
47  direction.y = target.y + repulsion.y;
48 
49  // fix if target and repulsion cancel out: only repulse
50  if (abs(direction.x) < 0.0001 && abs(direction.y) < 0.0001) {
51  direction.x = repulsion.x;
52  direction.y = repulsion.y;
53  }
54 
55  // normalize avoidance direction
56  double avoidance_dir = atan2(direction.y, direction.x);
57  direction.x = cos(avoidance_dir);
58  direction.y = sin(avoidance_dir);
59 
60  // avoidance magnitude, inverse to repulsion to move slower when other cpss close by
61  // linear function of cps distance f(d)
62  // minimum at d<=dist_critical: f(d)=dist_critical / 2
63  // maximum at d>=dist_avoid: f(d)=dist_avoid / 2
64  double avoidance_mag = min(0.5*dist_avoid, max(0.5*dist_critical, 0.5*closest));
65 
66  // avoidance displacement
67  if (setpoint == CONTROL_POSITION) {
68  int_pos.pose.position.x = pos.pose.position.x + direction.x * avoidance_mag;
69  int_pos.pose.position.y = pos.pose.position.y + direction.y * avoidance_mag;
70  int_pos.pose.position.z = goal_pos.pose.position.z;
71  }
72 
73  // avoidance velocity
74  else if (setpoint == CONTROL_VELOCITY) {
75  int_vel.linear.x = direction.x * avoidance_mag;
76  int_vel.linear.y = direction.y * avoidance_mag;
77  }
78 
79  return true;
80 }
81 
82 bool repulsion::sp_pos ()
83 {
84  return setpoint == CONTROL_POSITION;
85 }
86 
87 bool repulsion::sp_vel ()
88 {
89  return setpoint == CONTROL_VELOCITY;
90 }

92 void repulsion::set_sp_pos (const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped::ConstPtr& pos)
93 {
94  setpoint = CONTROL_POSITION;
95  goal_pos = *pos;
96  reset();
97 }

99 void repulsion::set_sp_vel (const geometry_msgs::Twist::ConstPtr& vel)
100 {
101  setpoint = CONTROL_VELOCITY;
102  target_vel = *vel;
103  reset();
104 }

109  pos_valid = true;
110  reset();
111 }

113 void repulsion::set_swarm (const cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors::ConstPtr& swarm)
114 {
115  this->swarm = swarm->vectors;
116  reset();
117 }

119 geometry_msgs::PoseStamped repulsion::get_dir ()
120 {
121  // use position of cps
122  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
123  dir = pos;
124 
125  // calculate orientation
126  tf2::Quaternion orientation;
127  orientation.setRPY(0, 0, atan2(direction.y, direction.x));
128  dir.pose.orientation = tf2::toMsg(orientation);
129 
130  return dir;
131 }

134 {
135  return int_pos;
136 }

138 geometry_msgs::Twist repulsion::get_vel ()
139 {
140  return int_vel;
141 }
142 
143 void repulsion::repulse (geometry_msgs::Vector3& repulsion, int& neighbors, double& closest)
144 {
145  // init repulsion
146  repulsion.x = 0;
147  repulsion.y = 0;
148  neighbors = 0;
149  closest = -1;
150 
151  // yaw of this cps
152  tf2::Quaternion orientation;
153  tf2::fromMsg(pos.pose.orientation, orientation);
154  double yaw = tf2::getYaw(orientation);
155 
156  // compute pair potentials for all neighbors
157  for (auto pose : swarm) {
158  // measure closest neighbor
159  if (pose.vector.magnitude < closest || closest < 0) {
160  closest = pose.vector.magnitude;
161  }
162 
163  // repulsion only from close neighbors
164  if (pose.vector.magnitude < dist_avoid) {
165  // count neighbors to repulse from
166  ++neighbors;
167 
168  // pair potential
169  double pot;
170 
171  // maximum repulsion
172  if (pose.vector.magnitude < dist_critical)
173  pot = 1;
174 
175  // repulsion following sine function
176  else if (repulsion_shape == "sine")
177  pot = 0.5 - 0.5 * sin(M_PI / (dist_avoid - dist_critical) * (pose.vector.magnitude - 0.5 * (dist_avoid + dist_critical)));
178 
179  // repulsion following exp function
180  else if (repulsion_shape == "exp")
181  pot = exp((pose.vector.magnitude - dist_critical) * 2.0*log(0.5) / (dist_avoid - dist_critical));
182 
183  // repulsion following linear function
184  else
185  pot = max(1 - (pose.vector.magnitude - dist_critical) / (dist_avoid - dist_critical), 0.0);
186 
187  // absolute bearing of neighbor
188  double bear = yaw + pose.vector.direction;
189 
190  // sum up potentials as vector pointing away from neighbor
191  repulsion.x += pot * -cos(bear);
192  repulsion.y += pot * -sin(bear);
193  }
194  }
195 }
196 
197 void repulsion::reset ()
198 {
199  int_pos = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
200  int_vel = geometry_msgs::Twist();
201  direction = geometry_msgs::Vector3();
202 }
203 
204 geometry_msgs::Vector3 repulsion::target_direction ()
205 {
206  geometry_msgs::Vector3 dir;
207 
208  // get direction towards original goal
209  if (setpoint == CONTROL_POSITION) {
210  // valid goal given
211  if (goal_pos.pose.position.x != 0 || goal_pos.pose.position.y != 0) {
212  // bearing of goal
213  double bear = atan2(goal_pos.pose.position.y - pos.pose.position.y, goal_pos.pose.position.x - pos.pose.position.x);
214 
215  // velocity components in goal direction
216  dir.x = cos(bear);
217  dir.y = sin(bear);
218  }
219  }
220 
221  // normalize velocity
222  else if (setpoint == CONTROL_VELOCITY) {
223  double mag = hypot(target_vel.linear.x, target_vel.linear.y);
224  if (mag > 0) {
225  dir.x = target_vel.linear.x / mag;
226  dir.y = target_vel.linear.y / mag;
227  }
228  }
229 
230  return dir;
231 }
